name: Throw Away Game (accident)
description:
The mob has cut off your trigger fingers - so you can hold guns, but not shoot them.  You make due by simply hurling them at your foes.  Throw props, enemies, or even enemy bullets to win!

All glitches are intentional features, planned from the very beginning.

This was accidentally submitted twice sorry! Please rate on this page instead https://itch.io/jam/gmtk-2018/rate/301238
